Changelog
=========

2.0.0 (2013-02-27)
------------------

Plone 4 required

- Now managing also the image download URL [keul]
- Updated templates to Plone 4 styles [keul]
- Can be uninstalled [keul]

1.0.1 (2012-08-02)
------------------

- supporting z3c.autoinclude [keul]

1.0.0 (2011-04-08)
------------------

- Initial release
